title: Should You Ever Tell Your Partner You Ran A Background Check On Them?
description:
When you're dating someone new, you want to know everything about them. Where they're from, where they work, and if they have a clean record.
But to find out some of this information, you have to run a background check on them. So if you do, do you tell that person?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
